propsSchema.metrics: Array<{ id: string, value: string, title: string, items: string[] }>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)
propsSchema.textBoxTitleImageWrapperClassName?: string - For styling image wrapper in inline-image layout
propsSchema.textBoxTitleImageClassName?: string - For styling images in inline-image layout
propsSchema.valueClassName?: string - For styling the large metric value
propsSchema.metricTitleClassName?: string - For styling the metric title text
propsSchema.featuresClassName?: string - For styling the PricingFeatureList container
propsSchema.featureItemClassName?: string - For styling individual feature items
